trends: There have been no other sightings in Barnsley
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Sun sized object in sky (not distant light) defini
divs: Sighting DetailsI first noticed object while stood at back door having a cigarette. Looking up Inoticed the object just above some trees approx 200yds away. The object wasfurther. Its size approx that of the sun. It was NOT the sun as that would havebeen over my right shoulder and to the rear. I checked around and it was not areflection. After a while the object moved to the right. Then very rapidly shotaway (decreased in size in an upward angle).During the sighting I wanted to getmy camera yet at the same time did not want to lose sight of the object by goingupstairs. When I had resolved to go then the object moved and disappeared asdescribed.
